{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = ProSecure Unified Threat Management (UTM) Appliance |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/UTM150 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = ProSecure |submodelappend = yes |submodel = UTM150 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Router Firewall, router, firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN5230; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 750 <!-- 500 / 600 / 700 / 800 / 900 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL640EHT2I-70G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = CompactFlash III |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Apacer;; |flash2size = 2 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;M470T2864EH3-CF7; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54616S; |eth3chip = Broadcom;BCM54616S; |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115; |wan_ports = 4 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 74:44:01
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.1;Development build; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, CompactFlash |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1 |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, DE-9, (9600 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J4
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = CompactFlash, RTC w/ battery backup, fan, heat sink, metal case, |addchip = I²C Serial Real-Time Clock;Maxim;DS1337;;1;,,, PLL-based Clock Generator;IDT;ICS30S07AIL;;1;,,, Low Skew 1 to 4 Clock Buffer;Integrated Device Technology;ICS651;;1;,,, High Speed 2-channel RS232/V.28 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, 3A Bus Termination Regulator;Richtek;RT9173;;1;,,, In-System Programmable PLD;Lattice Semi;LC4064ZE;;1;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT9214;;6;,,, 30V, 11A N-Channel Enhanced MOSFET;ANPEC Electronics;APM4820;;4;,,, 30V, 8A Dual N-Channel Enhanced MOSFET;ANPEC Electronics;APM7334;;3;,,, 25V, 55A N-Channel Enhanced MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AOD452;;2;,,, 560mA Low-Dropout Fixed Voltage Regulator;ANPEC Electronics;APL5508;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Cavium]] Octeon Plus CN5230 @750MHz Quad-core [[MIPS]]64 CPU *Flash/RAM: 8MB (SPI NOR)/1GB (DDR2) *CompactFlash Card: 2GB recognized as ''ide0'' in U-Boot * 4x GbE LAN ports, 4x GbE WAN ports * 1x USB 2.0 port
==See also== :;[[Netgear ProSecure series]] *[[Netgear ProSecure UTM110]] • (495$) *[[Netgear ProSecure UTM150]] • [https://www.storagereview.com/review/netgear-prosecure-utm150-review Review on '''Storagereview'''] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5230 @750MHz ''OCTEON Plus'' (Quad Core) :Flash/RAM: 2GB/1GB, WAN/LAN: 4x/4x GbE (RJ45), 1x USB ports *[[ITUS Networks Shield]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/itus_networks/itus_networks_shield ''Itus Networks Shield'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[[ITUS Networks Shield Pro]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
